readable.title: 3739833689_a0038545bd
readable.content: A little boy puts a bat on his forehead and spins around . A young boy holds his head to a baseball bat on the green grass . A young boy is spinning around a baseball bat on the grass . Little boy puts his forehead on the baseball bat and spins around to make himself dizzy . The little boy is wearing red shorts and a white t-shirt and has his head resting on a baseball bat .
